    • canSpawnNew

      public static boolean canSpawnNew(net.minecraft.world.level.Level level, net.minecraft.core.BlockPos blockPos)
      Check if we can spawn a new vengeance spirit in the given location. It will check if the amount of spirits in an area is below a certain threshold and if there aren't any gemstone torches in the area
      Parameters:
      level - The level.
      blockPos - The position.
      Returns:
      If we are allowed to spawn a spirit.
